channel.title: Providers of publishing services on EDRLab members
channel.description: Recent content in Providers of publishing services on EDRLab members

item.title: ePUBoo.com
item.description: provider of digital publishing solutions (e-book creation, global distribution, ONIX metadata generator, accessibility specialists)

item.title: e-Dant√®s
item.description: ebook diffuser; B&B agent linking publishers and e-bookstores.

item.title: Electre Data Services
item.description: Providers of publishing servicesprovides a bibliographic database of all books produced in France.

item.title: Elibri
item.description: active in Poland and in Ukraine, provides different services to publishers: book database, watermark ebook files, run a clearance system for distributors and publishers. Elibri is building a book lending system for Ukrainian libraries.

item.title: Flexedo
item.description: specialized in structured page layout and EPUB production

item.title: Isako
item.description: specialized in structured page layout and EPUB production.

item.title: Nord Compo
item.description: a company offering multiple publishing services, with a large EPUB expertise. Nord Compo can develop custom Readium-based mobile reading applications, with LCP support.

item.title: Pixellence
item.description: specialized in structured page layout and EPUB production.
